text: Balia barusibwa mutsinzu tsiabu munjila ilali yatoto, mbushichila boboolele mbu: “ Omulesi wefu ni Nyasaye” akhayanga okhulinda Abandu abandi mubo khubandi , toto amahekalu kakhafunakwe nende amakanisa nende tsinzu tsiamalaamo nende emisikiti chirumbulungwamwo elira lia Nyasaye muno. Toto Nyasaye alakhoonya ulia umukhoonya. Toto Nyasaye niwa amani muno Omushili
